    • iterator

      public Iterator<HTMLDocument> iterator()
      Return an iterator to the list of HTMLDocument objects corresponding to the site's local pages. Will facilitate access to data housed in the HTMLDocument objects.
      Specified by:

      Returns:

    • getHTMLDocuments

      Returns:
